New Records: Sese Bau became the second Papua New Guinea batter to hit a fifty in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Sese Bau played a fine knock of 50 runs against West Indies
Romario Shepherd claimed the wicket of Tony Ura
Assad Vala offered a brief respite with a striking six over extra cover
Miscellaneous Highlights: WI captain Rovman Powell won the toss and chose to bowl vs Papua New Guinea
Others: The match was a Group C opener in the T20 World Cup 2024
